import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { VscAccount } from 'react-icons/vsc'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductDetailsPage = () => { const [isDropdownVisible, setDropdownVisibility] = useState(false); const [bidAmount, setBidAmount] = useState(''); // State for bid amount const [bidders, setBidders] = useState([]); // State for the list of bidders const dropdownRef = useRef(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); const toggleDropdown = () => { setDropdownVisibility(!isDropdownVisible); }; const closeDropdown = () => { setDropdownVisibility(false); }; const handleLogout = () => { navigate('/'); }; const handleBid = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default form submission behavior // Update the list of bidders with the new bid const newBidder = { name: 'You', amount: parseInt(bidAmount) }; setBidders([newBidder, ...bidders]); // You can also send the bid to the server or perform other actions as needed }; return (
